description: Teaches you how to summon this mount.  This mount changes depending on your Riding skill and location.
name: Geosynchronous World Spinner

spell.name: Geosynchronous World Spinner
spell.description: A device that rotates the very world beneath you!  This mount changes depending on your Riding skill and location.

requiredAbility.name: Apprentice Riding
requiredAbility.description: You can now learn to ride ground mounts. You'll need to find a riding trainer for your race and then purchase a mount.
